modName: Call of Magic Main Menu replacer
summary: This mod changes the default Skyrim theme to Morrowind\'s \"Call of Magic\" song
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes the default Skyrim theme to Morrowind\'s \"Call of Magic\" song. I know a few people that wanted this and I saw it requested on the Steam Workshop so, here it is.

Link to the song: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I2qDap4hnmk

I would upload it to the Steam Workshop but, I don\'t know how. So, feel free to do so if you know how, or send me a message and let me know how too. :)
author: Bethesda Softworks
